mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBOT_MERCHANT_REPORT ( SERVER_ID, START_TIME_KST, END_TIME_KST, REGION_ID, ITEM_ID, TIME_VAL, INSERT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{serverId}, #{startTimeKst}, #{endTimeKst}, #{regionId}, #{itemId}, #{timeVal}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_ID AS itemId, ITEM_GRADE AS itemGrade FROM TBOT_MERCHANT_M
